title: Upgrade AfrofutureDAO to v2.0
body:
This proposal marks the upgrade of the AfrofutureDAO from v1.0 to v2.0.

The core instigators of AfrofutureDAO v1.0 were 
-Osinachi (https://osinachiart.com)
-Andrew Berkowitz (https://linkedin.com/in/andrewberko/)
-Salim Amin (https://weforum.org/people/salim-amin)
-Trupti Shah (https://ke.linkedin.com/in/trupti-shah-64a31425)

We are taking the next steps in the progressive decentralization of the AfrofutureDAO to the community. 

v2.0 includes:

-Introducing the premium AfrofutureDAO access tier that requires holding 500 $AFTR

-Ratifying the Afrofuture Manifesto (https://drive.google.com/file/d/1DAJzmjlcTPTTnB4C9L3NyfL0KUsTnxco/view?usp=sharing)

-Implement POAPs for all future events, proposal votes, and governance council meetings

-Activating AfrofutureDAO Metaverse spaces

-Opening up to 10 paid part-time roles within the DAO

For all discussions and comments on this proposal, please share thoughts in Discord. (https://discord.gg/JamN8Vkt75)

Please vote for one of the following options:
Yes - Upgrade from v1.0 to v2.0
No - Do not upgrade from v1.0 to v2.0
author: 0xBE918163c3839071de42F8529916DfE83e3B6897
